name: Piwik 4 Owncloud
tagline: Track Owncloud users with Piwik Web Analytics
body: # owncloud_piwik Track [Owncloud](https://owncloud.org) users with [Piwik Web Analytics](https://piwik.org). ## Requirements - Owncloud >= 8 - Working piwik installation (tested with 2.14.3) - Empty custom variable slots on index 1 and 2 ## What will be tracked? - Normal piwik stuff (url, page title, browser, ...) - User ID aka Owncloud user - App in first custom variable - Share ID in second custom variable (index.php/s/SHARE_ID) ## What will not be tracked? - Download - Outlink - File directory ## Installation - Download and extract to OWNCLOUD_DIR/apps/piwik/ - Enable app - If needed create a new site in your piwik installation - Insert piwik site id and url on the owncloud admin page (e.g. site id: 1, url: //domain.tld/piwik/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
